In Orenburg province, a two-foot crash hit a video recorder (18+)

A fatal accident occurred on the eve of the day on the 1214th kilometre of the M-5 road, Ural, Moscow-Celabinsk, in the North.
19 February12:29video videoComments

In the Buguruslan area, a retired (18+) died due to harbour gas poisoning

An elderly woman was also poisoned.
19 February12:20Comments

Knocked through the balcony: in Novotroitzka, the recidivist received 7.5 years ' imprisonment for robbery

A 34-year-old local resident had already arrived in prison for murder, illegal possession of narcotic drugs, looting and theft.
19 February11:52video videoComments

Under Saractaş, a driver from Kazakhstan who had been involved in the accident had been invited to drink and attacked a local citizen with a " dish "

The perpetrator is detained and handed over to the investigating committee.
19 February11:14Comments

There was a 42-year-old male in Orsk under the WAS 2102 wheel.

The accident occurred on the eve of House No. 4 on the Vocal Highway.
19 February11:09Comments

Small-scale Mustang cost 3.5 million roubles

Of these, 2.6 million roubles are customs payments and 940,000 roubles are late foams. The case went to the Orenburg Regional Court.
19 February09:45Comments

Less 1.7 million roubles: Rents waited three months for money from false Gasprom investment.

It took a long time for a woman to understand that she was a victim of fraud.
18 February21:13Comments

In the Orenburg district, the SNT guard had itself stolen from owners of plots.

The truth is, he's not in the territory of his garden non-profit partnership.
18 February20:17Comments

In Orsca, a young driver who hit a 17-year-old girl will stand trial.

He may lose his driver ' s licence from one and a half to two years.
18 February19:19Comments

Orska lost 110,000 roubles at the book of the Valentine's Day.

A 24-year-old local resident has already applied to the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs on Orenburg.
18 February17:13video videoComments

The name of an ex-worker of GIBD accused of the murder of a taxiist in Novosergiyev district (18+) was known.

According to our correspondents, a 43-year-old man is Ruslan Akisov. He had recently been extended to detention.
18 February3:30.Comments

In the middle of Orenburg, the house was burned again at night.

This time, I'm not lucky to have a two-stage on 9 January.
18 February09:35Comments

There were fires in Orenbury, and firefighters kept houses.

The burning of houses occurred in Orenburg and Orsca.
17 February21:17Comments

In Sharlyk, a husband with a straw turned on his wife.

In the Charles of the Orenburg Region, a sporadic husband did not keep his emotions during the fight and dissolved his hands.
17 February20:15Comments

The firemen rescued a woman from a breathing apartment in Orsca.

The burning of the apartment occurred on the eve of 16 February, about 7 p.m. in Orske Orenburg province.
17 February13:31Comments

Driver of the passenger bus after the fatal accident contacted the Rimburns

NefAZ driver killed an automotive conducer yesterday early morning, 12. His colleague recorded an appeal to the Iranians.
17 February11:05Comments

In the Dombar district, the jury acquitted the accused in a fatal beating of a man (18+)

A 25-year-old man was tried under the heading " Intentional infliction of serious harm on a person ' s health, which caused the death of the victim by negligence " .
17 February08:30Comments

Denis Tuchin, who killed a doctor in Orenburg, works at a clinical master (18+)

The Dzejin District Court of Orenburg examined the claim of the parents of Elena Fedorov, who was the victim of Denis Tuchin, for moral and property damages. The femid came to the side of the dead family. The decision has not entered into force, and in the meantime, Denis Tuchin is being treated in the Smole region.
16 February21:49video videoComments

In Orenburg, they sent a café guard to bar the eye of the visitor (18+)

Previously, a man was given a probationary period, but he was now replaced by a real imprisonment.
16 February21:13Comments

In Abdulino, a man was killed on Valentine's Day (18+)

He was 64. Criminal proceedings have been instituted in the Criminal Court of Orenburg.
16 February20:13Comments

...further,

Cases

This section orenday is devotedAccidents, Tragedies, Disasters and Crimesrelevantin Orenburgand Orenburg.
We're following the accident reports and we're telling you the most.Importantand relevant ones.

Avia and car crashes, accidents

Transport events unfortunately occur in large quantitiesevery day♪ Orenday does not report a number of situations, such as " bats " on the road. Our task is to inform readers promptly of the events that need to be known.

11 FebruaryA plane collapsed in PodmoskovjeSaratov airlines with orchards on board. It was the Moskva Orsk flight.71 passengersand crew members are dead.

Landing accidentUrban Districttook seven lives.♪ 18-year-old Camille Kuvatov, like saving a guardian angel, losing her parents, she became a guardian of a younger sister.

Large scale

“Snow prisoners”In 2016, due to heavy metal in the snowOrenburg-OrskThere are dozens of cars. People who freeze in their cars waited more than 15 hours.

Crimes and penalties

We're tracking information on crimes and telling people who and for what he's done or he's gonna be punished, be it.gangs or killersof commissionedthe killing of entrepreneursin Orenburg

Of course, it's impossible to keep quiet about when the Ringers becomeGlobalMMM -Family Copier CooperativeI left hundreds of people without blood. By investing money on interest, many have copied for surgery, housing and other important needs.

Officials often have problems with the law. For example,criminal proceedingsnow former head of OrenburgEugenia ArapovaconvictedHead of Gennady Borisov♪TrialsThe Ministry of Education, the Ministry of Labour and Employment of the Orenburg Region, the Ministry of Agriculture of the Region, addressed them.

Search operations

We don't stay indifferent if the security forces or volunteers ask for help and help from the bandwidths.searching for people♪ Stillnot establishedlocationA serial maniac from Orsca Valeria Andreeva♪

Stay on all the news with me.Orenday♪

All rights to be published on orenday are protected under the law of the Russian Federation. Any use of materials is permitted only in agreement with the Editor, with a mandatory active reference to the source.

The editorial is not responsible for the validity of advertisements posted on the website orenday.ru, the website content of the hyperlinks and the comments. Comments to the publications are personal views of the website users.
